CustomField.formula: DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT( YEAR( DATEVALUE( PTA__c ) )) & '-' & TEXT( MONTH( DATEVALUE( PTA__c ) ) ) & '-' & TEXT( DAY( DATEVALUE( PTA__c ) ) ) & ' ' & TEXT( HOUR( TIMEVALUE( PTA__c ) ) ) & ':' & TEXT( MINUTE(( TIMEVALUE( PTA__c ) ) ) ) & ':' & TEXT( SECOND(( TIMEVALUE( PTA__c ) ) ) )) +((PTA__c - CreatedDate) *24*60/1440)
CustomField.label: PTA formula
